00021    /*
00022    * Constructor.
00023    */
00024    LinkMaster::LinkMaster()
00025     : linkCapacity_(0),
00026       atomCapacity_(0)
00027    {}
00028 
00032    void LinkMaster::readParam(std::istream& in)
00033    {
00034       readBegin(in, "LinkMaster");
00035       read<int>(in, "linkCapacity", linkCapacity_); 
00036       read<int>(in, "atomCapacity", atomCapacity_); 
00037       readEnd(in);
00038 
00039       allocate();
00040    }
00041 
00045    void LinkMaster::addLink(Atom& atom0, Atom& atom1, int typeId)
00046    {
00047       Link* linkPtr;
00048       int   atom0Id = atom0.id();
00049       int   atom1Id = atom1.id();
00050 
00051       // Check preconditions
00052       if (atom0Id < 0 || atom0Id >= atomCapacity_) {
00053          Log::file() << "Atom0Id       = " << atom0Id << std::endl;
00054          Log::file() << "atomCapacity = " << atomCapacity_ << std::endl;
00055          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom0 id");
00056       }
00057       if (atom1Id < 0 || atom1Id >= atomCapacity_) {
00058          Log::file() << "Atom1Id       = " << atom1Id << std::endl;
00059          Log::file() << "atomCapacity = " << atomCapacity_ << std::endl;
00060          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom1 id");
00061       }
00062 
00063       // Pop an unused Link off the reservoir
00064       linkPtr = &reservoir_.pop();
00065       linkSet_.append(*linkPtr);
00066 
00067       // Initialize the link, and add its address to linkPtrs_[atomId]
00068       linkPtr->setAtoms(atom0,atom1);
00069       linkPtr->setTypeId(typeId);
00070       linkPtr->setIsActive(true);
00071       atomLinkSets_[atom0Id].append(*linkPtr);
00072       atomLinkSets_[atom1Id].append(*linkPtr);
00073 
00074       // Notify observers of addition of this Link.
00075       LinkAddEvent event(linkPtr);
00076       Notifier<LinkAddEvent>::notifyObservers(event);
00077    }
00078 
00079 
00083    void LinkMaster::removeLink(int id)
00084    {
00085       Link* linkPtr = &link(id);
00086       int  atom0Id;
00087       int  atom1Id;
00088 
00089       if (!link(id).isActive()) {
00090         UTIL_THROW("Attempt to remove a nonactive link");
00091       }
00092       atom0Id = linkPtr->atom0().id();
00093       atom1Id = linkPtr->atom1().id();
00094       // Remove link from atom0 and atom1 link sets
00095       if (!atomLinkSets_[atom0Id].isElement(*linkPtr)) {
00096         UTIL_THROW("Link is not in atomLinkSets of atom0");
00097       }
00098       if (!atomLinkSets_[atom1Id].isElement(*linkPtr)) {
00099         UTIL_THROW("Link is not in atomLinkSets of atom1");
00100       }
00101       atomLinkSets_[atom0Id].remove(*linkPtr);
00102       atomLinkSets_[atom1Id].remove(*linkPtr);
00103 
00104       // Notify observers of removal of this Link.
00105       // Notify before clearing Link so atomPtrs and typeId are available.
00106       LinkRemoveEvent event(linkPtr);
00107       Notifier<LinkRemoveEvent>::notifyObservers(event);
00108 
00109       // Clear the link: nullify atomPtrs, set typeId = -1, isActive = false
00110       linkPtr->clear();
00111 
00112       // Return link to reservoir 
00113       linkSet_.remove(*linkPtr);
00114       reservoir_.push(*linkPtr);
00115 
00116    }
00117 
00118    /*
00119    * Modify the atoms attached to a link
00120    */
00121    void LinkMaster::reSetAtoms(Link& link, Atom& atom0, Atom& atom1)
00122    {
00123       int   atom0Id = atom0.id();
00124       int   atom1Id = atom1.id();
00125       int   oldAtom0Id = link.atom0().id();
00126       int   oldAtom1Id = link.atom1().id();
00127      
00128       // Check preconditions    
00129       if (!link.isActive()) {
00130         UTIL_THROW("Attempt to reset atoms for a nonactive link");
00131       } 
00132       if (atom0Id < 0 || atom0Id >= atomCapacity_) {
00133          Log::file() << "Atom0Id       = " << atom0Id << std::endl;
00134          Log::file() << "atomCapacity = " << atomCapacity_ << std::endl;
00135          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom0 id");
00136       }
00137       if (atom1Id < 0 || atom1Id >= atomCapacity_) {
00138          Log::file() << "Atom1Id       = " << atom1Id << std::endl;
00139          Log::file() << "atomCapacity = " << atomCapacity_ << std::endl;
00140          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom1 id");
00141       }
00142 
00143       // Remove link from oldAtom0 and oldAtom1 link sets
00144       if (!atomLinkSets_[oldAtom0Id].isElement(link)) {
00145         UTIL_THROW("Link is not in atomLinkSets of atom0");
00146       }
00147       if (!atomLinkSets_[oldAtom1Id].isElement(link)) {
00148         UTIL_THROW("Link is not in atomLinkSets of atom1");
00149       }
00150       atomLinkSets_[oldAtom0Id].remove(link);
00151       atomLinkSets_[oldAtom1Id].remove(link);       
00152 
00153       // Change the atoms      
00154       link.setAtoms(atom0,atom1); 
00155       atomLinkSets_[atom0Id].append(link);
00156       atomLinkSets_[atom1Id].append(link);
00157       
00158       LinkResetEvent event(&link);
00159       Notifier<LinkResetEvent>::notifyObservers(event);      
00160  
00161    }
00162    
00163   /*
00164    * Modify one atom attached to a link
00165    */
00166    void LinkMaster::reSetAtom(Link& link, Atom& atom, int endId)
00167    {     
00168       int   atomId = atom.id();
00169       int   oldAtomId;
00170       
00171       if (endId==0){
00172         oldAtomId = link.atom0().id();
00173       }
00174       else {
00175         oldAtomId = link.atom1().id();
00176       }
00177       
00178       // Check preconditions    
00179       if (!link.isActive()) {
00180         UTIL_THROW("Attempt to reset an atom for a nonactive link");
00181       } 
00182       if (atomId < 0 || atomId >= atomCapacity_) {
00183          Log::file() << "AtomId       = " << atomId << std::endl;
00184          Log::file() << "atomCapacity = " << atomCapacity_ << std::endl;
00185          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom id");
00186       }
00187  
00188       // Remove link from oldAtom link sets
00189       if (!atomLinkSets_[oldAtomId].isElement(link)) {
00190         UTIL_THROW("Link is not in atomLinkSets of atom");
00191       }     
00192       atomLinkSets_[oldAtomId].remove(link);       
00193 
00194       // Change the atom      
00195       if (endId==0){      
00196         link.setAtoms(atom,link.atom1());
00197       }
00198       else {
00199    link.setAtoms(link.atom0(),atom);
00200       }
00201       atomLinkSets_[atomId].append(link);
00202       
00203       ReSetAtomEvent event(&link, endId);
00204       Notifier<ReSetAtomEvent>::notifyObservers(event);     
00205  
00206    }

00208    /* 
00209    * Get a randomly chosen link of a specified Species.
00210    */
00211    Link& LinkMaster::randomLink(Random& random)
00212    {
00213       int n = nLink(); 
00214       if (n <= 0) {
00215          UTIL_THROW("Number of links in species <= 0");
00216       }
00217       int id = random.uniformInt(0, n);
00218       return linkSet_[id]; 
00219    }

00225    void LinkMaster::allocate() 
00226    {
00227 
00228       links_.allocate(linkCapacity_);
00229       reservoir_.allocate(linkCapacity_);
00230       linkSet_.allocate(links_);
00231 
00232       // Set tags for all Links.
00233       for (int i = 0; i < linkCapacity_; ++i) {
00234          links_[i].setTag(i);
00235       }
00236 
00237       // Push all links onto reservoir stack, in reverse order.
00238       // The first element links_[0] wll be at the top of stack.
00239       int i;
00240       for (i = linkCapacity_ - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
00241          reservoir_.push(links_[i]);
00242       }
00243 
00244       // Allocate array of pointers to links.
00245       atomLinkSets_.allocate(atomCapacity_); 
00246    }
00247 
00248    /*
00249    * Return true if this LinkMaster is valid, or throw an Exception.
00250    */
00251    bool LinkMaster::isValid() const 
00252    {
00253 
00254       if (links_.isAllocated()) {
00255 
00256          if (links_.capacity() != reservoir_.capacity()) {
00257             UTIL_THROW("Unequal capacities for links_ and reservoir_");
00258          }
00259          if (links_.capacity() != reservoir_.size() + linkSet_.size()) {
00260             UTIL_THROW("links_ capacity != reservoir_ + linkSet_ sizes");
00261          }
00262 
00263          // Check consistency of all links in linkSet
00264          const Link*  linkPtr;
00265          const Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00266          const Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00267          int   i;
00268          for (i = 0; i < linkSet_.size(); ++i) {
00269 
00270             linkPtr = &(linkSet_[i]); 
00271             atom0Ptr = &(linkPtr->atom0());
00272             atom1Ptr = &(linkPtr->atom1());
00273 
00274             // Check: 
00275 
00276             // that neither atom0Ptr nor atom1Ptr is null
00277             if (atom0Ptr == 0 || atom1Ptr == 0) {
00278                UTIL_THROW("Link with one or both atoms missing");
00279             }
00280 
00281             // that atom0Ptr and atom1Ptr are distinct
00282             if (atom0Ptr == atom1Ptr) {
00283                UTIL_THROW("Link connects an atom to itself");
00284             }
00285 
00286             // that the link is active
00287             if (!linkPtr->isActive()) {
00288                UTIL_THROW("Link in linkSet is not Active");
00289             }
00290 
00291             // that the Link is in the AtomLinkSet of atom0 and of atom1
00292             if (!atomLinkSets_[atom0Ptr->id()].isElement(*linkPtr)) {
00293                UTIL_THROW("Link is not in atomLinkSets of atom0");
00294             }
00295             if (!atomLinkSets_[atom1Ptr->id()].isElement(*linkPtr)) {
00296                UTIL_THROW("Link is not in atomLinkSets of atom1");
00297             }
00298 
00299          }
00300 
00301          // Count all active links in links_ array
00302          int nCount = 0;
00303          for (i = 0; i < linkCapacity_; ++i) {
00304             linkPtr = &links_[i]; 
00305             if (linkPtr->isActive()) {
00306                ++nCount;
00307             }
00308          }
00309          if (nCount != linkSet_.size()) {
00310             UTIL_THROW("Number of Links with atoms != linkSet.size()");
00311          }
00312 
00313          // Count all links int AtomLinkSets_ (each appears twice)
00314          nCount = 0;
00315          for (i = 0; i < atomCapacity_; ++i) {
00316             nCount += atomLinkSets_[i].size();
00317          }
00318          if (nCount != 2*linkSet_.size()) {
00319             UTIL_THROW("Number links in atom sets != 2*linkSet.size()");
00320          }
00321 
00322       }
00323 
00324       return true;
00325    }
00326 
00330    void LinkMaster::clear() 
00331    {
00332       for (int id = nLink()-1; id >= 0; id--) {
00333          removeLink(id);
00334       }
00335    }
